Body: Most apps in the Google Play store have a free version and a paid version. On iOS there is a shop called Cydia, where you can try out most apps for free before you buy them in the App Store.Is there such a store for rooted Androids as well?I know of the store F-Droid for free software  F-Droid is an installable catalogue of FOSS (Free and Open Source Software)
Title: Is there a shop like Cydia on iOS for Android?

history.Text: Most apps in the Google Play store have a free version and a paid version. On OSX there is a shop called Cydia, where you can try out most apps for free before you buy them in the applestore.Is there such a store for rooted androids as well?I know of the store [fdroid][1] for free software> F-Droid is an installable catalogue of FOSS (Free and Open Source Software)  [1]: https://f-droid.org/
Is there a shop like Cydia on OSX for android?

history.Comment: Just editing OSX to iOS, since Cydia is an iOS thing (Not OSX)
